movie.title: A Man for All Seasons
movie.plot: The story takes place in 16th century England. But men like Sir Thomas More, who love life yet have the moral fiber to lay down their lives for their principles, are found in every century. Concentrating on the last seven years of English chancellor's life, the struggle between More and his King, Henry VIII, hinges on Henry's determination to break with Rome so he can divorce his current wife and wed again, and good Catholic More's inability to go along with such heresy. More resigns as chancellor, hoping to be able to live out his life as a private citizen. But Henry will settle for nothing less than that the much respected More give public approval to his headstrong course.

events.title: Franz Jägerstätter is sentenced to death

movie.title: A Hidden Life
movie.plot: The Austrian Franz Jägerstätter, a conscientious objector, refuses to fight for the Nazis in World War II.

events.title: the bomb-maker receives a text message

movie.title: Casino Royale
movie.plot: James Bond goes on his first ever mission as a 00. Le Chiffre is a banker to the world's terrorists. He is participating in a poker game at Montenegro, where he must win back his money, in order to stay safe among the terrorist market. The boss of MI6, known simply as M sends Bond, along with Vesper Lynd to attend this game and prevent Le Chiffre from winning. Bond, using help from Felix Leiter, Mathis and having Vesper pose as his partner, enters the most important poker game in his already dangerous career. But if Bond defeats Le Chiffre, will he and Vesper Lynd remain safe?
movie.awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 26 wins & 44 nominations.

events.title: Gretchen Carlson files a lawsuit against Roger Ailes
